### Problem 13.1

```{r}
BabyNames %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>%
  filter( rank(desc(count)) <= 5) 
```

### Problem 13.2
a)
```{r}
Names_<-
  BabyNames%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  filter(rank(desc(count))<= 100)%>%
  summarise(total=sum(count))%>%
  arrange(desc(year))%>%
  mutate(ranking="Top100")
Names_
```

b)
```{r}
Top100<-
  Names_%>%
  spread(key = ranking,value=total)%>%
  arrange(desc(year))%>%
  mutate(fractionB=(Top100)/ (Top100))
Top100
```
c) 
```{r}
Top100 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y = fractionB))+
  geom_point()+ggtitle("Popular names vs Time")+
  xlab("Year")+ylab("Fraction of the Babies")
```
### Problem 13.3
```{r}
Pnames<-
BabyNames%>%
group_by(year)%>%
mutate(ranking=rank(desc(count)))%>%
filter(rank(desc(count))<= 50)%>%
group_by(name)%>%
summarise(sum(count))
Pnames
```
```{r}
Unpopular<-
  BabyNames%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  mutate(ranking=rank(desc(count)))%>%
  filter(rank(desc(count))>1000)%>%
  group_by(name)%>%
  summarise(sum(count))
Unpopular
```

```{r}
Join<-
  Pnames%>%
  inner_join(Unpopular, by = "name")
Join
```
